note: Supports color on the Macintosh II.

PictureBase An easy-to-use graphics management system that allows the user to Symmetry Corp. build a library of graphics. PictureBase can handle bit-mapped and (602) 844-2199 object images in color or in black and white

note: Heads auto-park at power (714) 259-9555 down. Compatible with the AppleShare® File Server.

title: National Instruments The functions of these boards include analog-to-digital and digital-to-(512) 250-9119 analog conversion, digital I/O, event timing, and IEEE-488 interface. These boards feature full software support under the LabVIEW software construction system

Silver Server Internal 91MB hard disk drive for the Macintosh II. Includes such Hard and Soft features as 18ms access time; 1:1 interleave factor; and automatic (305) 772-0430 head park and lock, with dynamic braking, at power down.
